February 5, 2013

Categories

  • aviation

Wonderful post on AviationIntel.com about the history of the US’ newest spyplane, the RQ-170 SentinelÂ which was used in the Osama Bin Laden raid and most famously was forced to land in Iran. Â The post traces the origin of the airplane from early technology demonstrators. Â I love reading about the covert programs of the US military and intelligence programs and wonder what other yet-to-be-disclosed airplane programs there are out there.
